thread.title: Queen Elizabeth's Sapphire Jubilee: Royal Mail issues £5 stamp to commemorate accession to the throne
thread.title_full: Queen Elizabeth's Sapphire Jubilee: Royal Mail issues £5 stamp to commemorate accession to the throne

title: Queen Elizabeth's Sapphire Jubilee: Royal Mail issues £5 stamp to commemorate accession to the throne
text:
Revealed: The Sapphire Blue £5 stamp 
The Royal Mail has issued a Sapphire Blue £5 stamp   Queen's accession to the throne. 
The stamp, available from Monday, marks 65 years since Princess Elizabeth became Queen following the death of her father George VI on February 6 1952. 
  stamp features the colour of the precious item. 
Last year, the Royal Mail issued a series of 10 postage stamps to mark the monarch's 90th birthday, with Prince George featuring on a stamp for the first time. 
The image of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge's two-year-old son was captured by photographer Ranald Mackechnie. Read more
